JusticeMetricExplanation.weighted-score: The total amount of score earned in the role divided by the months in the role

position-in-role.present-role: The position among other users in the same role as of today
position-in-role.past-role: The position among other users in the same role as the last day the role was done by the user

JusticeMetricExplanation.months-in-role: The number of months in the role as of today (excluding absences and temporary exemptions that exempt from guarding). A month is considered 30 days
JusticeMetricExplanation.camp-and-settlement-defense-count: Camp defense and settlement defense count
JusticeMetricExplanation.holiday-overlaps: The number of duties that overlapped with some holiday (doesn't contribute to the total amount of duties)

Admin.title: admin actions
Admin.upload-guarding-assignments: upload guarding duties and their assignments
